Registration

Authorization

{{userName}}

{{login}}

{{password}}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { CookingService } from '../cooking.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-authorization', templateUrl: './authorization.component.html', styleUrls: ['./authorization.component.css'] }) export class AuthorizationComponent implements OnInit { public isRegirtrated : boolean = true; userName: any = 'u'; login: any = 'l'; password: any = 'p'; constructor (private cookingService: CookingService) {} changeState(){ this.isRegirtrated = !this.isRegirtrated; } signIn(): void { this.cookingService.userSignIn(this.login, this.password).subscribe(token => this.cookingService.token = token); } signUp(): void { this.cookingService.userSignUp(this.userName, this.login, this.password).subscribe(); } ngOnInit() : void { } }
